Author: strangernumberone
Text: At the very least it sounds like you suffer from body dysmorphia, but your relationship with food would have me lean more towards yes on the eating disorder than no. Sometimes I think I actually have no idea what I really look like because my own self-image changes so constantly. I also have a very love/hate relationship with food. It's like I allow myself either everything or next to nothing and it's this cruel, shitty cycle. I hope you find some answers and comfort.
